§ 2871. Repealed. Pub. L. 95–568, § 8(a)(2), Nov. 2, 1978, 92 Stat. 2428
Section, Pub. L. 88–452, title III, § 321, Aug. 20, 1964, 78 Stat. 525; Pub. L. 89–253, § 30(c), Oct. 9, 1965, 79 Stat. 979; Pub. L. 89–794, title III, § 302, Nov. 8, 1966, 80 Stat. 1465; Pub. L. 91–177, title I, § 101(b), Dec. 30, 1969, 83 Stat. 827; Pub. L. 92–424, § 2(a), Sept. 19, 1972, 86 Stat. 688; Pub. L. 93–644, § 14(a), Jan. 4, 1975, 88 Stat. 2329, set forth provisions relating to duration of and authorization for appropriations for program.
